name: The Color of the Roses
description: Dmitriy – successive and ambitious young man who works as a real estate agent. His seemingly quiet and regular life is dramatically changing after one unfortunate nightcall.
minimum_requirements: İşletim Sistemi: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10 İşlemci: 1.2 GHz Bellek: 2 GB RAM Ekran Kartı: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card Depolama: 1 GB kullanılabilir alan
